extensionDescription.message: 掌控你的 Cookie！关闭标签页后自动删除未想保留的 Cookie。您可以设置想要保留的白名单。
extensionDescription.description: Control Your Cookies! Auto Delete Unused Cookies From your Closed Tabs While Keeping The Ones You Want.

notificationContent.message: 已删除 $Num$ 个下列网站的 Cookie：$Websites$

cookieCleanupIgnoreOpenTabsText.message: 清理所有 Cookie（忽略打开的标签页）

clearCookiesForDomainText.message: 清除此域名的所有 Cookie
clearCookiesForDomainText.description: Clear All Cookies For This Domain

welcomeMessage.message: Cookie AutoDelete 在本次会话期间已删除 $sessionDeleted$ 个 Cookie；累计已删除 $totalDeleted$ 个 Cookie。
welcomeMessage.description: Hi there! During this session, Cookie AutoDelete has deleted 123 cookies and in total 456 cookies.

reviewLinkMessage.message: 感谢您尝试 Cookie AutoDelete。如果您喜欢，请来评价吧。
reviewLinkMessage.description: Thanks for trying out Cookie AutoDelete. If you liked it, then please give a Review.

activeModeText.message: 启用主动模式？清理前延迟：
activeModeText.description: Enable Active Mode? Delay Before Cleaning:

activeModeTooltipText.message: 主动模式启用时，将在标签页关闭时清理 Cookie。
activeModeTooltipText.description: When active mode is enabled, cookie cleanup is triggered on tab close.

statLoggingText.message: 记录已删除 Cookie 的总数
statLoggingText.description: Log Total Number Of Cookies Deleted

statLoggingTooltipText.message: 记录本次会话期间删除的 Cookie 数量，以及总计数量。此数字将在本扩展“选项”的欢迎信息中显示。
statLoggingTooltipText.description: Counts the number of cookies deleted during this session and in total. This is shown in the Welcome Screen.

showNumberOfCookiesInIconText.message: 显示该域名的 Cookie 数量
showNumberOfCookiesInIconText.description: Show Number of Cookies for that Domain

showNumberOfCookiesInIconTooltipText.message: 显示该域名的 Cookie 数量
showNumberOfCookiesInIconTooltipText.description: Show Number of Cookies for that Domain

notifyCookieCleanUpText.message: 清理 Cookie 后显示通知

notifyCookieCleanUpTooltipText.message: 显示已清除哪个域的多少个 Cookie。
notifyCookieCleanUpTooltipText.description: Shows how many cookies were cleaned and for which domain.

contextualIdentitiesEnabledText.message: 启用 Firefox 的身份（容器）支持（实验性，Firefox 53+）
contextualIdentitiesEnabledText.description: Enable Support for Firefox's Contextual Identities (EXPERIMENTAL Firefox 53+)

contextualIdentitiesTooltipText.message: 如非 Firefox 53+ 版本，请勿启用。这将为您使用的每个容器添加不同的白名单。您的默认白名单与此不同。
contextualIdentitiesTooltipText.description: Do NOT Enable unless you are on Firefox 53+. This will add a different whitelist for EACH containers you use. Your default whitelist is separate from these.

defaultSettingsTooltipText.message: 警告：这也将清除您的网址设置。请先注意备份它们！
defaultSettingsTooltipText.description: WARNING: This will also clear your URLS as well. So make a backup of them!

enterURLTooltipText.message: 输入网址，无需 'www.' 部分。输入后按回车（Enter）键或单击“添加网址”。您也可以先访问所需网站，然后点击工具栏上的蓝色图标来添加白名单。
enterURLTooltipText.description: Enter URLS without the 'www.' part, then press 'Enter' or 'Add URL'. Alternatively go to the site and add it from the blue icon.

rightClickToSave.description: Right Click to Save Link As
